duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform orthopaedic and hand surgical procedures in a hospital setting.
Provide trauma care for hand injuries and participate in on-call coverage.
Manage and contour medical practice to physician preferences and patient needs.
Collaborate with other healthcare professionals for comprehensive patient care.
Contribute to the development and implementation of new surgical techniques and approaches.
Engage in research and publication of findings in the field of orthopaedic surgery and hand surgery.

education_certification.credential: Medical Degree with specialty training in Orthopaedic Surgery and Hand Surgery.
